title: Ghost Ship Deck Adventure #19
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Ghost Ship Main Deck
rooms.description: You stand on the weathered deck of an abandoned ship shrouded in thick fog. The wood creaks beneath your feet, and ghostly whispers echo across the deck. Tattered sails hang from broken masts, and a pale green light emanates from below deck. The ship's wheel stands at the helm, and various nautical equipment lies scattered about.

items.name: ship's wheel
items.description: An old wooden ship's wheel with strange carvings around its rim
items.text: Carved into the wheel: 'The Phantom Maiden - Launched 1692 - Captain Mordecai Graves commanding'

items.name: stack of barrels
items.description: Several weathered barrels lashed together near the mast

items.name: rusty crowbar
items.description: A heavy iron crowbar, still sturdy despite the rust

items.name: navigation table
items.description: A table with nautical charts and instruments, featuring two drawers

items.name: first mate's log
items.description: A water-stained journal belonging to the first mate
items.text: First Mate's Log: Captain Graves has gone mad with greed. The cursed treasure from Devil's Cove has doomed us all. The ship was launched in 1692, the same year this nightmare began. May God have mercy on our souls.

items.name: brass key
items.description: A tarnished brass key with a skull emblem

items.name: wooden hatch
items.description: A heavy hatch leading below deck, secured with a rusty lock

rooms.name: Captain's Quarters
rooms.description: A dimly lit cabin filled with the remnants of a captain's life at sea. A large desk dominates the room, covered in maps and documents. A portrait of a stern-faced captain hangs on the wall, his eyes seeming to follow your movement. The air is thick with the smell of salt and decay. A locked door to the west leads deeper into the ship.

items.name: portrait of Captain Graves
items.description: An oil painting of a bearded man in a captain's uniform
items.text: Brass nameplate reads: 'Captain Mordecai Graves - Master of the Phantom Maiden - Lost at Devil's Cove'

items.name: captain's desk
items.description: An ornate wooden desk with intricate carvings and multiple compartments

items.name: captain's journal
items.description: A leather-bound journal with the captain's personal entries
items.text: Final Entry: The crew whispers of mutiny. They blame me for the curse, but I only sought fortune at Devil's Cove. The treasure is hidden in the cargo hold, protected by questions only I can answer. First: my name. Second: where we found our doom. Third: the name of my cursed vessel.

items.name: old treasure map
items.description: A map showing Devil's Cove and the location of cursed treasure
items.text: The map shows Devil's Cove marked with an X. A note reads: 'Here we found the cursed gold that doomed the Phantom Maiden and all who sail upon her.'

items.name: silver key
items.description: A small silver key with intricate engravings

items.name: captain's sea chest
items.description: A large wooden chest bound with iron bands

items.name: glowing compass
items.description: A compass that glows with an eerie green light, its needle pointing toward escape

items.name: reinforced door
items.description: A heavy door leading to the cargo hold. Three questions are carved into the wood, glowing with ghostly light.

password_questions.question: What is the captain's name?
password_questions.hint: Check the ship's wheel and the portrait

password_questions.question: Where was the cursed treasure found?
password_questions.hint: Read the captain's journal and examine the treasure map

password_questions.question: What is the name of this ship?
password_questions.hint: The ship's wheel has the vessel's name carved into it

rooms.name: Cargo Hold
rooms.description: You've reached the ship's cargo hold! The room is filled with crates and barrels, but in the center sits an open chest overflowing with cursed gold coins that glow with an unnatural light. Ghostly figures of the crew materialize around you, but they seem at peace now. A rope ladder leads up through an opening to a lifeboat on the deck above.

items.name: chest of cursed gold
items.description: An overflowing chest of gold coins, jewels, and artifacts from Devil's Cove

items.name: spectral crew members
items.description: The translucent forms of the ship's crew, finally at rest now that someone has solved the captain's riddles

items.name: rope ladder
items.description: A sturdy rope ladder leading up to freedom

rooms.name: Lifeboat
rooms.description: You climb into a small lifeboat that has miraculously remained seaworthy. As you push off from the ghost ship, the fog begins to lift. The Phantom Maiden fades into mist behind you, finally released from its curse. The spectral compass in your hand points toward home.

items.name: wooden oars
items.description: A pair of sturdy oars to row yourself to safety

rooms.win_message: You have escaped the Ghost Ship Deck! As you row away, you hear the grateful whispers of Captain Graves and his crew fading into the mist. The curse is broken, and you are free. The spectral compass will guide you safely home. You win!
